title: Why Visma-Lease a Bike Is Putting Its Tour de France Future in the Hands of a Swim Expert
content:
Visma is calling on a former Olympic swim guru to bring multi-sport thinking into the void left by retiring Tour de France mastermind Merijn Zeeman. Will it work?

Read the full article at Why Visma-Lease a Bike Is Putting Its Tour de France Future in the Hands of a Swim Expert on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
